name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: Maraschino cherry and orange slice for garnish
instructions: Add whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white (if using) to a shaker.
Dry shake (without ice) for 10 seconds if using egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake vigorously for 15 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a cherry and orange slice.
Add 2-3 dashes of Angostura bitters on top of the foam if desired.
